sentences.en: All Villefort's influence barely enabled him to stifle the secret Dantes had so nearly divulged.
sentences.cn: 维尔福用尽全部力量才刚刚能封住那几乎被邓蒂斯所泄漏的秘密.

sentences.en: Ample bone, strong and flexible , moderately angulated at stifle and hock.
sentences.cn: 充足的骨量, 结实且柔韧, 后膝关节和飞节的角度恰当.

sentences.en: Coercer: Silence - Stifle effect can now affect Epic targets.
sentences.cn: Coer:Silence 造成的窒息效果将能作用在Epic级目标上.

sentences.en: During this time I would stifle all feelings of guilt.
sentences.cn: 在这期间,我将隐藏所有内疚感.

sentences.en: Gritting my teeth, I did my best to stifle one or two remarks.
sentences.cn: 我咬紧牙关，硬是吞回了几句话。

sentences.en: He managed to stifle the spasmodic sobs of panic rising in his throat.
sentences.cn: 他惊慌得差一点哭了起来，不过还是竭力地克制住了。

sentences.en: He was almost stifled by the fumes.
sentences.cn: 他差点被烟熏得窒息了。

sentences.en: His hand shot to his mouth to stifle a giggle.
sentences.cn: 他赶紧捂住嘴，不让自己笑出声来。

sentences.en: How can this party stifle debate on such a crucial issue?
sentences.cn: 该党怎么可以压制对这么一个重要问题的辩论？

sentences.en: It is best to stifle curiosity and leave birds' nests alone.
sentences.cn: 最好能克制住好奇心，不要去碰鸟巢。

sentences.en: It is most commonly seen in the stifle , elbow , shoulder , and hock.
sentences.cn: 该疾病由骨软骨病引起.

sentences.en: It was an uninteresting conversation and I had to stifle a yawn.
sentences.cn: 那是一次枯燥无味的交谈,我不得不强忍住自己的呵欠.
对孩子们制定的各种规定压制了创造力。

sentences.en: rules and regulations that stifle innovation
She makes no attempt to stifle a yawn.
She managed to stifle a yawn.
She tried hard to stifle her laughter.
Worse, its drive to cut costs could stifle innovation overseas.
sentences.cn: 更糟的是, 它在降低成本上的努力可能会扼杀海外的创新.

sentences.en: You spread ignorance, lies and poison; you stifle thought, freedom and intellect.
sentences.cn: 你传播愚昧无知, 谎言和毒害; 你禁锢思想, 自由和智慧.

words.tran_cn: 使窒息；粉碎（stifle的现在分词）

trans.tran_cn: （马等的）后膝关节；（马等的）[动] 后膝关节病

trans.tran_en: If someone stifles something you consider to be a good thing, they prevent it from continuing
to stop something from happening or developing
